tool_description: Assesses the audience's existing knowledge level on the presentation topic to determine appropriate depth, terminology, and background information needed.

presentation_topic.description: Main topic or subject of the presentation

audience_background.description: General background of the audience (e.g., 'technical', 'business', 'mixed', 'general public')

prior_exposure.description: Audience's prior exposure to the topic ('none', 'basic', 'intermediate', 'advanced')

technical_depth_required.description: Whether technical details are necessary for the presentation goals

error_messages: Invalid presentation topic: Topic cannot be empty or contain only whitespace
Invalid audience background: Must specify background type like 'technical', 'business', 'mixed', or 'general public'
Invalid prior exposure: Must be 'none', 'basic', 'intermediate', or 'advanced'
Missing required parameters: presentation_topic, audience_background, and prior_exposure are required
usage: Provide presentation_topic, audience_background, and prior_exposure level. Optionally specify if technical_depth_required. The tool returns knowledge assessment and content recommendations.

knowledge_level.description: Assessed overall knowledge level of the audience on the topic

background_needed.description: Background concepts that should be explained before diving into main content

terminology_level.description: Appropriate level of technical terminology to use

content_depth.description: Recommended depth level for content presentation

learning_curve_factors.description: Factors that may affect audience comprehension and learning speed
